data.name: BMToken
data.description:
## What Is Beepmagnet

Beepmagnet International was officially Founded in 2014, while BMToken was Launched on March 23rd, 2020. With combined team experience of 25
years, the team believes that the next Economic wave for Africa is e-commerce and blockchain-driven solution. BeepMagnet Group believes that it is positioned to lead the way in Africa by implementing the Proof of Concept of her utility Token across all her subsidiaries to drive the adoption of blockchain consumer loyalty solutions. BeepMagnet International Group is using the tools of eCommerce and blockchain as a defector to solving the challenges of Traditional Loyalty reward ( Non-Blockchain based)

## What Is BMToken?

Beepmagnet Token ( BMToken) is an ERC20 Token running on Etherum network which represents a utility token of Beepmagnet International Group. BMToken, the primary loyalty Reward token of Beepmagnet Multi-integrated E-commerce portal known as Global empowerment Initiative ( GEI ) (https://gei.qtradeai.com), also serves as a Consumer Loyalty Reward Token which is earned as you spend across merchants of Beepmagnet Group. Beepmagnet Ecosystem further supports BMT as her consumer Loyalty reward token which has a maximum supply of 30million tokens.

With the BMToken, users can:

- Earn BMToken on BeepAgro Products ( Beepagro Soup Mix and Drinks)
- Earn BMToken on BeepMagnet Sanitary product ( Sisibox)
- Earn BMToken on Beepmagnet Real estate product ( Beep Estates)
- Earn BMToken on Beepmagnet Recruitment Agency ( HarnessMLM ) - https://harnessmlm.com
- Spend BMToken on Beepmagnet mobile game Application ( Mobgames
International )
- Spend BMToken on Beepmagnet Laundry Mart.

The vision is to revolutionalize consumer loyalty rewards globally by allowing merchants to reward their customers with a digital value exchange on the Etherum network. With BMToken, customers can spend earned BMT across merchants. When You think of a consumer Loyalty Token that is supported with 11 use cases, BMToken is designed to fill this Gap.
